D. Mental Health
1. Reduce high rate of admissions to mental hospital 20% in 1 year in Central, S, SE, HW, SW, Inglewood and Compton districts (see attachment #6).

2. Reduce high suicide rates 20% in 1 year in Central district (& others).

3. Reduce high rate of alcoholism 20% in 1 year in Central, SB, Harbor districts.

4. Reduce high incidence of narcotics and drug abuse 20% in 1 year in NE, E.L.A. and among college population.

5. Reduce incidence of emotional disturbance associated with MR in all districts.
